beats.narration: Little Sugar MTB. Bentonville, Arkansas. 30 mi.

beats.editing_note: Quick establishing shot. Show race card, then cut to route map or location footage.

beats.label: EVIDENCE
beats.narration: Technicality. 5 out of 5. Technical enough to ruin your day on wrong tires. Prestige. 5 out of 5. The one people ask about first. Race Quality. 5 out of 5. Everything about this race is dialed.
beats.visual: Animated score cards — one per dimension
beats.editing_note: Each dimension gets 4-5 seconds. Visual change on EVERY score. Use Von Restorff: if any score is 5/5 or 1/5, isolate it visually (different color flash, avatar reaction shot). [RIFF HERE] after any extreme score.

beats.label: REVEAL
beats.narration: Little Sugar MTB. The Icons. 77 out of 100. Elite company.
beats.editing_note: SILENCE for 0.5s before reveal (long-form technique adapted). Then: tier badge slams in. Avatar reaction. This is the Von Restorff moment — make it visually distinct. [RIFF HERE] after tier badge lands.

beats.label: CTA + LOOP
beats.narration: Full breakdown. Free prep kit. Link in bio.
beats.editing_note: Design for LOOP: the final frame should visually connect back to the hook frame. On TikTok, seamless loops = replays = the strongest algorithmic signal.
beats.engagement_question: Should prestige count more than the numbers?
